[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:5, topic:118638”][code]import java.io.*;

public class RangeHandler {
public void ProjectileArrows(int startID, int movingID, int finishID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX) {
//GraphicsHandler.createSpell(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
GraphicsHandler.createArrow(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
}
public void playerHasArrowsDelete(){
if(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] == 1){
deleteequiment(playerEquipment[playerArrows], playerArrows);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0){
outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
outStream.writeWord(1688);
outStream.writeByte(playerArrows);
outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerArrows]+1);
if (playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1 > 254) {
outStream.writeByte(255);
outStream.writeDWord(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1);
} else {
outStream.writeByte(playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -1); //amount
}
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] -= 1;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public boolean playerHasArrows() {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841){ // wood
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 885){ // arrows to iron
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 885) {
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;
} else{
sendMessage(“You have no arrows left in your quiver.”);
return false;
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845){ // oak
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 887){ // arrows to steel
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 887){
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;
} else{
sendMessage(“You have no arrows left in your quiver.”);
return false;
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849){ // willow
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 889){ // arrows to mith
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 889){
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;
} else{
sendMessage(“You have no arrows left in your quiver.”);
return false;
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851){ // maple
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 891){ // arrows to addy
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 891){
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;
} else{
sendMessage(“You have no arrows left in your quiver.”);
return false;
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857){ // Yew
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 891){ // arrows to addy
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 891){
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;
} else{
sendMessage(“You have no arrows left in your quiver.”);
return false;
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861){ // magic
if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 882 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] <= 893){ // arrows to rune
return true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] >= 893){
sendMessage(“You need a stronger bow to fire these arrows”);
return false;

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 4212 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= 4223){ // crystal
return true;
}
return false;
}

	public boolean RangeHit(int index) {
	if(server.playerHandler.players[index] == null) return false;
		int enemyDef = RangeDEF+BoostDEF+server.playerHandler.players[index].playerBonus[10] + (server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[1] / 3);
		int myBonus = playerBonus[5] + (playerLevel[4] / 5);

	if(misc.random(myBonus) > misc.random(enemyDef)) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
	public boolean RangeHitNPC(int index) {
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[index] == null) return false;
		int enemyDef = server.npcHandler.npcs[index].npcRangeDEF+server.npcHandler.npcs[index].npcDefence;
		int myBonus = playerBonus[5] + (playerLevel[4] / 5);

	if(misc.random(myBonus) > misc.random(enemyDef)) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
	public boolean Range() {
	int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
	int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
	int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
    client otherPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
	int oY = ((absY - PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY) * -1); 
	int oX = ((absX - PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX) * -1);
	
	for(int anIntii = 0; anIntii < 708; anIntii++) {
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == server.Weapons[anIntii].weaponID){	
		TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
		int hitDiff = 0;
		if((otherPlayer.pvpCaslewarz == true) || (otherPlayer.pvpDuelarena == true) || (otherPlayer.pvpFightpitz == true) || (otherPlayer.pvpWilderness == true) && (pvpCaslewarz == true) || (pvpDuelarena == true) || (pvpFightpitz == true) || (pvpWilderness == true)){ // in pvp area?
			if((LoopAttDelay == 0)){ // Can attack
				CheckWildrange(otherPlayer.combat);
				if(InWildrange == true){
					if(otherPlayer.killedByPlayer == playerId || otherPlayer.killedByPlayer == 0){
						int dist = server.Weapons[anIntii].weaponDIST;
						if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, atX, atY, dist) == true) { // In range for melee attack EDIDTED FOR HALLYS
							holdPlayer = true; holdTimer = 1;
							if(playerHasArrows() == true){
								int loosearrowPERCENT = 0;
								int arrowHit = 0;
								if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 4212 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= 4223){
									ProjectileArrows(472, 473, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); arrowHit = (int)(double)16;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 883){
									ProjectileArrows(19, 10, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 6; arrowHit = 3;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 885){
									ProjectileArrows(18, 11, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 5; arrowHit = 4;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 887){
									ProjectileArrows(20, 12, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 4; arrowHit = 5;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 889){
									ProjectileArrows(21, 13, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 3; arrowHit = 6;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 891){
									ProjectileArrows(22, 14, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 2; arrowHit = 7;
								} else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 893){
									ProjectileArrows(24, 15, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); loosearrowPERCENT = 1; arrowHit = 8;
								} else {
									ProjectileArrows(472, 473, 0, absY, absX, oX, oY, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX);
								}
								setAnimation(server.Weapons[anIntii].weaponPlayerSEA);
								int wepPKdelay = server.Weapons[anIntii].weaponSpeed;
							
								CalculateRange();
								int type = 0;
								int hit = 0;

								if(RangeHit(AttackingOn) == true){
									hit = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
									type = 0; // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting 2: poison 3: orange
									if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
										hitDiff = EnemyHP;
									}
									otherPlayer.newhptype = true;
									otherPlayer.hitDiff = hit;
									otherPlayer.updateRequired = true; otherPlayer.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
									otherPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true; otherPlayer.update1Required = true;
								} else {
									hit = 0;
									otherPlayer.hitDiff = hit;
									otherPlayer.updateRequired = true; otherPlayer.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
									otherPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true; otherPlayer.update1Required = true;
	
								}
								otherPlayer.killedByPlayer = playerId;
								otherPlayer.inCombat();
								dammage2player[AttackingOn] = dammage2player[AttackingOn]+hit;
								
								if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 4212 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= 4223){ // crystal
									// no arrows to drop!!
								} else {
									int dropaArrow = misc.random(15-loosearrowPERCENT);
									playerHasArrowsDelete();
									if(dropaArrow <= 5){
										DropArrows(EnemyX, EnemyY);	
									} else {
										//lost a arrow
									}
								}
								int HitExp = (int)((int)(double)hitDiff * 90.5555);
								int HpExp = (int)((int)(double)HitExp / 3.2987);
								addSkillXP((int)(HpExp), playerHitpoints);
								addSkillXP((int)(HitExp), 4);
							
								LoopAttDelay = wepPKdelay;
							} else {
								ResetRange();	
							}
						} else {
							//move2player(AttackingOn);
						}
					}
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need to be deaper to attack this player.");
				}
				}
		} else {
			sendMessage("You need to be in the wilderness to attack other players.");
			ResetRange();
		}
	}

	}
	return true;
}
public boolean RangeNPC() {
	int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
	int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
	int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP;
	int oY = ((absY - server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY) * -1); 
	int oX = ((absX - server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX) * -1);
	faceNPC(attacknpc);

	for(int anIntii = 0; anIntii < 708; anIntii++) {
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == server.Weapons[anIntii].weaponID){	
	//	TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
		int hitDiff = 0;
			if((LoopAttDelay == 0)){ // Can attack

public void DropArrows(int EnemyX, int EnemyY) {
	if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) == 0) {
		ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false);
	} else if (ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY) != 0) {
		int amount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY);
		ItemHandler.removeItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount);
		ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, amount + 1, playerId, false);
	}
	
}

public void CalculateRange() {
	double MaxHit = 0;
	int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; //Range Bonus
	int Range = playerLevel[4]; //Range
            {
		MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus + Range) / 15));
	} 
	//MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.2);
	playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);
}

	public boolean RangeHit(int index) {
	if(server.playerHandler.players[index] == null) return false;
		int enemyDef = RangeDEF+BoostDEF+server.playerHandler.players[index].playerBonus[10] + (server.playerHandler.players[index].playerLevel[1] / 3);
		int myBonus = playerBonus[5] + (playerLevel[4] / 5);

	if(misc.random(myBonus) > misc.random(enemyDef)) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
	public boolean RangeHitNPC(int index) {
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[index] == null) return false;

		int myBonus = playerBonus[5] + (playerLevel[4] / 5);

		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
